```{r}
# Load libraries
library(censusapi)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)


```



```{r}



county_pres_returns <- read.csv("data/county_pres_returns/countypres_2000-2016.csv")

head(county_pres_returns)

county_pres_returns <- county_pres_returns %>%
  filter(state == "Tennessee") %>%
  mutate(
    party = case_when(
      is.na(party) ~ "other or no party",
      !is.na(party) ~ party
    )
  ) %>%
  select(year,county,candidate,party,candidatevotes,totalvotes)

write.csv(county_pres_returns,"data/county_pres_returns/county_pres_returns.csv",row.names = FALSE)


```
